verses.verse: The elders <S%G4245><s%> which are among <S%G1722><s%> you I exhort, <S%G3870><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> am also <S%G2532><s%> an elder, <S%G4850><s%> and a witness <S%G3144><s%> of the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> a partaker <S%G2844><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> that shall be revealed: <S%G601><s%>

Feed <S%G4165><s%> the flock <S%G4168><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is among <S%G1722><s%> you, taking the oversight <S%G1983><s%> thereof, not by constraint, <S%G317><s%> but willingly; <S%G1596><s%> not for filthy <S%G147><s%> lucre, <S%G147><s%> but of a ready <S%G4289><s%> mind; <S%G4290><s%>
Neither <S%G3366><s%> as being lords <S%G2634><s%> over <S%G2634><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> heritage, <S%G2819><s%> but being <S%G1096><s%> ensamples <S%G5179><s%> to the flock. <S%G4168><s%>
And when the chief <S%G750><s%> Shepherd <S%G750><s%> shall appear, <S%G5319><s%> you shall receive <S%G2865><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> that fades <S%G262><s%> not away.

Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> you younger, <S%G3501><s%> submit <S%G5293><s%> yourselves to the elder. <S%G4245><s%> Yes, <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you be subject <S%G5293><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> and be clothed <S%G1463><s%> with humility: <S%G5012><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> resists <S%G498><s%> the proud, <S%G5244><s%> and gives <S%G1325><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to the humble. <S%G5011><s%>

Humble <S%G5013><s%> yourselves therefore <S%G3767><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the mighty <S%G2900><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that he may exalt <S%G5312><s%> you in due <S%G2398><s%> time: <S%G2540><s%>
Casting <S%G1977><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> care <S%G3308><s%> on him; for he cares <S%G3199><s%> for you.

Be sober, <S%G3525><s%> be vigilant; <S%G1127><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> adversary <S%G476><s%> the devil, <S%G1228><s%> as a roaring <S%G5612><s%> lion, <S%G3023><s%> walks <S%G4043><s%> about, <S%G4043><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> he may devour: <S%G2666><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> resist <S%G436><s%> steadfast <S%G4731><s%> in the faith, <S%G4102><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that the same <S%G846><s%> afflictions <S%G3804><s%> are accomplished <S%G2005><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> brothers <S%G81><s%> that are in the world. <S%G2889><s%>

But the God <S%G2316><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has called <S%G2564><s%> us to his eternal <S%G166><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> by Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> after that you have suffered <S%G3958><s%> a while, <S%G3641><s%> make <S%G2675><s%> you perfect, <S%G2675><s%> establish, <S%G4741><s%> strengthen, <S%G4599><s%> settle <S%G2311><s%> you.
To him be glory <S%G1391><s%> and dominion <S%G2904><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

By Silvanus, <S%G4610><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to you, as I suppose, <S%G3049><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%> briefly, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3641><s%> exhorting, <S%G3870><s%> and testifying <S%G1957><s%> that this <S%G5026><s%> is the true <S%G227><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> wherein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3757><s%> you stand. <S%G2476><s%>

The church <S%G1577><s%> that is at <S%G1722><s%> Babylon, <S%G897><s%> elected <S%G4899><s%> together <S%G4899><s%> with you, salutes <S%G782><s%> you; and so does Marcus <S%G3138><s%> my son. <S%G5207><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> you one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with a kiss <S%G5370><s%> of charity. <S%G26><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be with you all <S%G3956><s%> that are in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
